text: Tarek El Moussa is ready to overcome another injury. On Thursday evening, the Flip or Flop star shared some ` ` awful news'' with his followers on Instagram. As it turns out, the proud father injured his back again. ` ` Last time I lost 50 pounds and was taking large amounts of pain meds to try and help the pain. Truthfully those meds really affected my mental and physical state and changed who I was. Last time I hurt my back it took me a year and a half to recover. As of today I can barely walk...'' Tarek shared online. ` ` I honestly can't even believe this is happening, I feel like it's a bad dream that I will wake up from.'' The HGTV star continued,
